posts.post_content:
All prices include shipping.  PayPal, money order or check.

Tinker $85  SOLD
Evers $125 OBO
Chance $75  SOLD

Tinker has very minor paper loss on the back, otherwise VG/EX without any creases.  

Evers has minor paper loss on the first "E" in CIGARETTE, otherwise a very nice card.  

Chance has minor paper loss on the back just under the "N" in Piedmont.  Minor crease running vertically through his hands.  

All 3 display very nicely.

Bump and one more price reduction on Evers before going to eBay

I sent this to SGC instead of eBay.  It came back an SGC 30 because of the minor paper loss on the back.  There are no creases.  Will sell for $125 OBO.  It was shipped today and I should have it back in hand by Friday.
